channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- JBoss Enterprise Application Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- JBoss Enterprise Application Platform

item.title: CVE-2016-7066|2024-08-06T01:50:47.460Z -- red%20hat -- jboss%20enterprise%20application%20platform
item.description: It was found that the improper default permissions on /tmp/auth directory in JBoss Enterprise Application Platform before 7.1.0 can allow any local user to connect to CLI and allow the user to execute any arbitrary operations.
